name: Appointment Analytics
query:
select 
Clinic AS 'Clinic:Data:150',
Doctor AS 'Doctor:Data:150',
Status as 'Status:Data:100',
count(CANAME) AS 'عدد:Int:100',
sum(T.Billed) as 'Billed:Int:100',
sum(T.partially) as 'partially Billed:Int:100'
from
(select 
PA.name as 'CANAME',
PA.clinic as 'Clinic',
PA.doctor_name as 'Doctor',
PA.status as 'Status',
SUM(CASE WHEN SI.status = 'Paid' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) as 'Billed',
SUM(CASE WHEN SI.status = 'Overdue' OR SI.status= 'Partly Paid' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) as 'partially'
FROM `tabClient Appointment CT` AS PA
LEFT JOIN `tabSales Invoice` SI
on PA.NAME = SI.appointment
WHERE PA.appointment_date >= %(from_date)s 
and PA.appointment_date <= %(to_date)s  
group by
PA.clinic,
PA.name,
PA.doctor_name,
PA.status) as T
group by
T.Status, T.Doctor, T.Status
order by 
T.clinic,
T.Doctor,
T.status
